ability.Verdant Growth: At the end of each turn, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP if the weather is Sunny Day.
ability.Spring Guardian: Boosts the power of Grass-type moves by 30% during Sunny Day.

Fusang Flame.effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

Willow Whip.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Spring Renewal.effect: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP and cures all status conditions.
